summary: Completed comprehensive testing of GPI Document Hub Settings configuration feature. All backend APIs and frontend UI components working correctly. New Configure Credentials dialog successfully implemented with all 11 configuration fields organized by service (Entra ID, Business Central, Microsoft Graph). Secret masking, field validation, and save/load functionality all operational.
passed_tests: GET /api/settings/config - returns current config with secrets masked
PUT /api/settings/config - updates config values and returns updated masked config
Settings page loads with all connection cards (MongoDB, SharePoint, Business Central, Entra ID)
Demo Mode notice displays correctly with Configure button
Configure Credentials button opens dialog successfully
Dialog contains all 11 configuration fields organized in 3 sections
Tenant ID field accepts and saves test values
BC Environment, Company Name, Client ID fields functional
Graph Client ID, SharePoint hostname/path/library fields present
Secret fields (BC Client Secret, Graph Client Secret) have show/hide toggles
Demo Mode switch toggle works correctly
Save functionality persists values to backend .env
Cancel button closes dialog without saving
Test buttons for SharePoint and Business Central connections work
All configuration values load correctly from backend
Authentication and navigation flow working properly
